statements: SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Data LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity, sensor_type FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE anomaly_score > 0.8 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, sensor_type, anomaly_score FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity < 50 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp, temperature, humidity, sensor_type, anomaly_score FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT sensor_type, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM IoT_Device_Data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING avg_temperature > 20 AND avg_humidity < 70 ORDER BY avg_temperature DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE anomaly_score > 0.5 GROUP BY device_id HAVING data_count > 100 ORDER BY data_count DESC;

SELECT device_id, MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM IoT_Device_Data GROUP BY device_id HAVING max_temperature - min_temperature > 10 ORDER BY max_temperature DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(anomaly_score) AS avg_anomaly_score FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE humidity < 50 GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING avg_anomaly_score > 0.3 ORDER BY avg_anomaly_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE device_id = 123;
SELECT sensor_value, data_timestamp FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE anomaly_status = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM IoT_Device_Data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_issues FROM Cybersecurity_Issues WHERE issue_type = 'security';
SELECT * FROM Cybersecurity_Issues WHERE issue_id > 100 ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, data_timestamp, sensor_value FROM IoT_Device_Data WHERE anomaly_status = TRUE ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Cybersecurity_Issues WHERE issue_type LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY issue_id;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_issues FROM Cybersecurity_Issues GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_issues DESC;
SELECT device_id, SUM(sensor_value) AS total_sensor_value FROM IoT_Device_Data GROUP BY device_id HAVING total_sensor_value > 10000 ORDER BY total_sensor_value DESC;
SELECT issue_type, COUNT(*) AS total_issues FROM Cybersecurity_Issues GROUP BY issue_type ORDER BY total_issues DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM IoTDevices WHERE firmware_version = 'v1.0';
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE data_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, event_timestamp FROM AnomalyEvents WHERE anomaly_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE firmware_version = 'v1.0';
SELECT DISTINCT device_name FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM IoTDevices WHERE location IS NOT NULL AND device_name ILIKE '%sensor%';
SELECT event_id, anomaly_type, details FROM AnomalyEvents ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM iot_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM iot_devices WHERE device_type = 'Sensor';
SELECT AVG(data_value) AS average_value FROM data_records;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_issues ORDER BY reported_at DESC;
SELECT device_name, anomaly_type FROM iot_devices JOIN data_records ON iot_devices.device_id = data_records.device_id JOIN anomaly_detection ON data_records.record_id = anomaly_detection.record_id;
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM iot_devices;
SELECT record_id, timestamp, data_value FROM data_records ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_score > 0.8;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM data_records GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT issue_description, issue_severity, reported_at FROM cybersecurity_issues WHERE issue_severity = 'High' ORDER BY reported_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature, humidity FROM device_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT device_id, MAX(temperature), MIN(humidity) FROM device_data GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM cybersecurity_issues WHERE severity >= 3 ORDER BY issue_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version, is_active FROM devices WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT device_id, temperature, humidity FROM device_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM anomaly_detection WHERE anomaly_type='Critical' AND anomaly_score > 0.8 ORDER BY detected_at ASC;
SELECT device_id, issue_description, severity FROM cybersecurity_issues WHERE severity >= 3 ORDER BY severity DESC, issue_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM devices WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY device_name;
SELECT id, username, email, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
